attribute.name: event
attribute.validValues: A space-separated list of event descriptors. See for details.
attribute.description: A list of designators of events that trigger this transition. See for details on how transitions are selected and executed. See for the definition of the datatype.

attribute.name: cond
attribute.validValues: Any boolean expression. See for details.
attribute.description: The guard condition for this transition. See for details.

attribute.name: target
attribute.validValues: A legal state specification. See for details.
attribute.description: The identifier(s) of the state or parallel region to transition to. See for details.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Determines whether the source state is exited in transitions whose target state is a descendant of the source state. See for details.
